list.abs: 定位词：ninety per cent, Pacific salmon解题关键字：sockeye or pink salmon文中对应点：
多数成年鲑鱼生活在北太平洋沿岸,这其中包括大鳞大麻哈鱼(chinook)、大麻哈鱼(chum)、银大麻哈鱼(coho)、幼小鲑鱼(pink salmon)和红大麻哈鱼(sockeye salmon)。.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 19th cent.: from Salish sukai, literally 'fish of fishes'

means.word_mean: 1. fatty red flesh of salmon of Pacific coast and rivers
2. small salmon with red flesh; found in rivers and tributaries of the northern Pacific and valued as food; adults die after spawning
